text: Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ kareyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ kareyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 1. Should any bhikkhunī make a bowl-hoard (have more than one bowl in her possession), it is to be forfeited andconfessed. [See Bhikkhus' NP 21]
